item.description: Important Relations His daughter [[Alma]], who got sick Made a deal with the [[Hag]] Attacked [[Liza Vorn]]
Erama is a non-binary elf with a light grey ponytail and an all-black outfit. He is extremely stealthy Important Relations [[Lord Roseseeker]]’s right hand
Lord Barion Roseseeker is a rather pale human, probably late 30s or early 40s with brown hair and beard and piercing blue eyes.
Important Relations Right hand of [[Lord Roseseeker]] Fucked up [[Tia Thunderstep|Tia]], [[Avaaros Wolfwalker|Avaaros]], and [[Davelor]] in a pub fight
